ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-02-02 22:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-02-02 22:10:00
Category I activation for 31-year-old male with penetrating neck wound.
GSW to lateral neck. Wound to right side of neck.
GCS 14. Patient agitated.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-02-02 22:30:00
Wound to right lateral neck noted.
No documentation of platysma integrity.
No platysma examination performed.
No zone classification documented.
No hemodynamic documentation.
No imaging obtained.
Patient taken for further assessment.
